description: This guy sounded very ambitious. He didn’t finish high school but was incredibly confident about his abilities. I had my doubts but he managed to convince me. His ideal employer was an international company, which gives you an idea what kind of guy he was. Well, I had a sales consultant position open. It was just a fancy name for a salesman but he was very impressed. He wanted to leave his current job badly. Only problem was that he couldn’t afford our mediation fee. The guy was really handsome and I loved his smart casual clothes. I didn’t waste time and offered him a naughty solution, which he accepted. I wanted to do much more than look. And to be honest, this fellow was kinda in to it, too. He did ask for money but I’m certain he enjoyed it as much as I did.
title: Dirty Scout 155
